actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend by three years the time for filing an application for an exemption from self-employment income tax by ministers and other members of religious orders.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend from two to five years the time for filing of an application for an exemption from the social security tax on self-employment income by ministers and other members of religious orders.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend by three years the time for filing an application for an exemption from self-employment income tax by ministers and other members of religious orders.
